title: Building and Contributing
content:
To compile this app, Go 1.23+ is needed.
make # make install # install service, ..., dry-run # make V=1 install # Do install actions, reak mode make release # cross-build some targets Or go build straightly:
go build -tags "full" # 编译完整版本 And cross-building by soecifying GOOS and GOARCH envvars:
GOOS=windows GOARCH=386 go build -tags "full" # windows x86 GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -tags "full" # linux arm64
